description:
Made from Repreve® recycled polyester and a burly plastic buckle, it keeps your pants up wherever you're headed, whatever you're doing. Goes with your snow pants, jeans or fancy pants. Yes, it really is that versatile. The slimmed down profile slides in and out of most belt loops.

  • Flat, low-profile buckle is easy to open and close, yet won't get in the way during activity
  • Stretch material
  • One-size design for the perfect fit every time
  • Machine washable should things get funky
name: Arcade Blackwood Slim Belt - Unisex
